channel.title: Newbienewty's AutoTalker

item.title: Newbienewty's AutoTalker
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Just a very simple auto-talker!

[code] //------------>Made By NewbieNewty
//----------->The Next Big Name In SCAR
//-----------> Scripts pretty easy to understand
//-----------> This is My 1st Real Script
//------------> No Bugs At All

program NewbieNewty;
{.include Squig.txt}
Const
WordsToType =‘TEXTHERE!’; //Hit f2 for this saying
WordsToType2 =‘TEXTHERE!’; //Hit f3 For Saying
WordsToType3 =‘TEXTHERE!’; //Hit f4 For Saying
Procedure Talk;
begin
if(IsFKeyDown(2))then
begin
Sendkeyshuman(WordsToType);
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false);
end;
wait(100);
end;
Procedure Talk2;
begin
if(IsFKeyDown(3))then
begin
Sendkeyshuman(wordsToType2);
Sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,false);
end;
wait(100);
end;
Procedure Talk3;
begin
if(IsFKeyDown(4))then
begin
SendkeysHuman(wordstotype3);
Sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,false);
end;
wait(100);
end;
Procedure Newbie;
begin
repeat
Talk;
Talk2;
Talk3;
until(false);
end;

Begin
repeat
Newbie;
until(false)
end.

[/code]
